name: 2 Lane Racers
description:
2 Lane Racers
Test your skills weaving through traffic.
Control two cars at the same time, collect tools to upgrade cars. 20 cars to unlock, and more coming.
See how far you can go.

2 hands required, tap left of screen for the left car, and right of screen for the right car.

-One tap controls
-Endless game play
-Game Centre Leaderboard to challenge friends
